languages.text: {n}Инквизитор тяжко вздыхает.{/n} "Чтож, среди слуг Императора безгрешных немного. Заставить искренне раскаяться кого-либо из них насильно не под силу даже мне. Вам же я уже назвал цену своего снисхождения — Ефрат-II".

{n}The Inquisitor sighs heavily.{/n} "What can I say? Few among the Emperor's servants are without guilt. Forcing heartfelt repentance out of any of them is more than even I can do. As for you, I have already told you the price of my lenience. Eufrates II."
languages.original_text: {n}Инквизитор тяжко вздыхает.{/n} "Чтож, среди слуг Императора безгрешных немного. Заставить искренне раскаяться кого-либо из них насильно не под силу даже мне. Вам же я уже назвал цену своего снисхождения — Ефрат-II".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor sighs heavily.{/n} "What can I say? Few among the Emperor's servants are without transgression. Forcing heartfelt repentance out of any of them is more than even I can do. As for you, I've already named you the price of my lenience. Eufrates II."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor sighs heavily.{/n} "What can I say? Few among the Emperor's servants are without transgression. Forcing heartfelt repentance out of any of them is more than even I can do. As for you, I've already named you the price of my lenience. Eufrates II."

traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor sighs heavily.{/n} "What can I say? Few among the Emperor's servants are without guilt. Forcing heartfelt repentance out of any of them is more than even I can do. As for you, I have already told you the price of my lenience. Eufrates II."

languages.text: {n}大审判官沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“我还能说什么呢？帝皇的仆人之中，很少有不会犯错的人，就连我都没办法强迫他们发自内心地忏悔。至于你，我已经告诉了你宽大处理的代价，拿下欧夫拉茨二号星。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor sighs heavily.{/n} "What can I say? Few among the Emperor's servants are without guilt. Forcing heartfelt repentance out of any of them is more than even I can do. As for you, I have already told you the price of my lenience. Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“我还能说什么呢？帝皇的仆人之中，很少有不会犯错的人，就连我都没办法强迫他们发自内心地忏悔。至于你，我已经告诉了你宽大处理的代价，拿下欧夫拉茨二号星。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}異端審問官が深いため息をつく。{/n}「どう答えればいいのだ？罪を持たない皇帝の従者はほとんどいない。心からの贖罪を強制するなど私にも不可能だ。お前に関しては、私の寛容の代償はすでに伝えた通りだ。ユーフラテス・II」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor sighs heavily.{/n} "What can I say? Few among the Emperor's servants are without guilt. Forcing heartfelt repentance out of any of them is more than even I can do. As for you, I have already told you the price of my lenience. Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官が深いため息をつく。{/n}「どう答えればいいのだ？罪を持たない皇帝の従者はほとんどいない。心からの贖罪を強制するなど私にも不可能だ。お前に関しては、私の寛容の代償はすでに伝えた通りだ。ユーフラテス・II」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}El Inquisidor suspira con fuerza.{/n} «¿Qué puedo decir? Pocos sirvientes del Emperador están libres de culpa. Forzar el arrepentimiento sincero de cualquiera de ellos es más de lo que puedo hacer. En cuanto a usted, ya le he revelado el precio de mi indulgencia. Eufrates II».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor sighs heavily.{/n} "What can I say? Few among the Emperor's servants are without guilt. Forcing heartfelt repentance out of any of them is more than even I can do. As for you, I have already told you the price of my lenience. Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Inquisidor suspira con fuerza.{/n} «¿Qué puedo decir? Pocos sirvientes del Emperador están libres de transgresión. Forzar el arrepentimiento sincero de cualquiera de ellos es más de lo que puedo hacer. En cuanto a usted, ya le he nombrado el precio de mi indulgencia. Eufrates II».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Der Inquisitor seufzt schwer.{/n} "Was soll ich sagen? Kaum ein Diener des Imperators ist frei von Schuld. Aus ihnen aufrichtige Reue herauszuquetschen, das vermag nicht einmal ich. Was Euch angeht, ich habe Euch den Preis für meine Gnade genannt. Eufrates II."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor sighs heavily.{/n} "What can I say? Few among the Emperor's servants are without guilt. Forcing heartfelt repentance out of any of them is more than even I can do. As for you, I have already told you the price of my lenience. Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Inquisitor seufzt schwer.{/n} "Was soll ich sagen? Einige wenige Diener des Imperators sind frei von jeder Sünde. Aus ihnen aufrichtige Reue herauszuquetschen, das vermag nicht einmal ich. Was Euch angeht, ich habe Euch den Preis für meine Gnade bereits genannt. Eufrates II."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}L'inquisiteur pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Hélas, rares sont les serviteurs de l'Empereur qui peuvent se targuer d'être totalement innocents, mais que voulez-vous ? Personne ne peut forcer quelqu'un à se repentir, pas même moi. Quant à vous, vous connaissez déjà le prix de mon indulgence : Euphrate-II. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor sighs heavily.{/n} "What can I say? Few among the Emperor's servants are without guilt. Forcing heartfelt repentance out of any of them is more than even I can do. As for you, I have already told you the price of my lenience. Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'inquisiteur pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Hélas, rares sont les serviteurs de l'Empereur qui peuvent se targuer de n'avoir commis aucune transgression, Mais que voulez-vous ? Personne ne peut forcer quelqu'un à se repentir, pas même moi. Quant à vous, vous connaissez déjà le prix de mon indulgence : Euphrate-II. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu ağır bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Ne diyebilirim ki? İmparator'un hizmetkârları arasında günahsız olan pek azdır. Samimiyetle pişmanlık duymalarını ben bile sağlayamam. Sana gelince... Müsamahamın bedelini zaten biliyorsun. Eufrates II."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor sighs heavily.{/n} "What can I say? Few among the Emperor's servants are without guilt. Forcing heartfelt repentance out of any of them is more than even I can do. As for you, I have already told you the price of my lenience. Eufrates II."
